Title: Mustang
Actors: Günes Sensoy, Doga Zeynep Doguslu, Tugba Sunguroglu, Elit Iscan
Plot: When five orphan girls are seen innocently playing with boys on a beach, their scandalized conservative guardians confine them while forced marriages are arranged.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 45 wins & 61 nominations.
Production: Canal+, Uhlandfilm, Cine+, Vistamar Filmproduktion, Doha Film Institute, CG Cinéma, Bam Film, Kinology
